des: "I've been eating these delicious treats for 30 years! They are a staple on the boardwalk of the New Jersey coastline. Get your napkins, they are messy but fabulous!"
ins: Arrange 2 waffles on a serving plate. Divide vanilla ice cream, strawberry ice cream, and chocolate ice cream evenly over waffles and drizzle with chocolate syrup. Top with remaining waffles to create 2 sandwiches.
